subs.text: I liked Atom on Ubuntu, it was a nice markdown editor. So, it was sad to read Github is archiving this project. Now, I need to start searching for another one. [link]

subs.text: What a terrible move this from the end users' perspective. It's unfortunate that Google is taking Android towards a closed ecosystem, undoing its benefits over iOS one at a time. This needs correction, soon. [link]

subs.text: People almost invariably don’t want to hurt other people and feel bad when they do. The fact that we can feel a lack of respect or kindness in a given social situation is evidence that those good qualities are the water we normally swim in. Source: ... [link]
